con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc jersey:generatedBy="Jersey: 2.5.1 2014-01-02 13:43:00" xmlns:jersey="http://jersey.java.net/"/> <doc jersey:hint="This is simplified WADL with user and core resources only. To get full WADL with extended resources use the query parameter detail. Link: http://localhost:8080/pre/service/application.wadl?detail=true" xmlns:jersey="http://jersey.java.net/"/> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8080/pre/service/"> <resource path="/estimate"> <method id="estimate" name="POST"> <request> <param name="wsUserID" style="header" type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="wsPassword" style="header" type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="consumerTransactionId" style="header" type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/api-docs"> <method id="resourceListing" name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=utf-8"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/{route: .+}"> <param name="route" style="template" type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method id="apiDeclaration" name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=utf-8"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>

con:parameter.con:name: wsUserID
con:parameter.con:description: Mutually agreed Id of the consumer of the Estimator

con:parameter.con:name: wsPassword
con:parameter.con:description: Password associated to wsUserID for calling the Estimator

con:parameter.con:name: CallerId
con:parameter.con:description: Caller ID of the user in calling system

con:parameter.con:name: callerIP
con:parameter.con:description: IP of API Caller in consuming system
